Understate: The claim may understate the extent to which Texas Department of Public Safety troopers are instructed not to inquire into immigration status unless individuals are under arrest.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough supporting evidence or data to prove that standing orders exist for Texas Department of Public Safety troopers regarding immigration status.
Problematic assumption: The claim may assume that the standing orders mentioned are solely attributed to Gov. Rick Perry, without considering other factors or individuals involved.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or reasons for why Texas Department of Public Safety troopers are instructed not to inquire into immigration status unless individuals are under arrest.
